DOC.brief_summary: The goal prospective study evaluate feasibility 22-G Core Biopsy Needle reverse bevel ( Procore TM ) biopsy sample subepithelial tumor upper gastrointestinal tract .
DOC.brief_title: 22-G-Procore Needle Diagnosis SETs Upper GI Tract
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient age 18 year old 2 . All patient subepithelial tumor upper GI tract ( maximum size : 3 cm ) 1 . Unable obtain informed consent 2 . ASA class 4 5 3. know pregnancy 4. contraindication endoscopy 5. contraindication take biopsy
